instruction:
Connect the Bigquery project to the external resource of Vertex AI. The connection id is 'text_generation'.
Here is a step-by-step tutorial from an expert instructing you how to complete it:
We need to connect to the external resource Vertex AI.
1. Click "+Add" in explorer to add a new connection.
2. At this time we found that a new window popped up on the right side of the screen, click 'Connections to external data sources'ã€‚
3. In the Connection type list, select Vertex AI remote models, remote functions and BigLake (Cloud Resource)
4. Set Connection ID to 'text_generation'
5. Click the blue button below 'CREATE CONNECTION'.
Connection established
You can exactly follow the detailed plan above or proactively tackle the task based on the real-time environment interaction by yourself.
